author: smuzaffar
body:
#### PR description:

- DetectorDescription/DDCMS/src/DDSpecparRegistry.cc: Return `string_view` instead of address of local temporary string object.
- SimTracker/TrackerMaterialAnalysis/plugins/dd4hep/DD4hep_MaterialAccountingGroup.cc :  Avoid loop variable copy.

#### PR validation:

Local compilation for CLANG and normal IBs show no warnings.
title: [LLVM10] Fixing compilation warnings for SIM/GEOM
